languages.text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the damage of this attack before this bonus is applied.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава II. Локация VoidshipTemple.
Любые атаки дополнительно наносят 100% Fire урона.

languages.text: Los ataques de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} adicional igual al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus ataques.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} adicional igual al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus ataques.

languages.text: この生物の攻撃は、追加で自分の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}分の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: この生物の攻撃は、追加で自分の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}分の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 受强化的生物攻击时会额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，额外伤害等同于攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: 受强化的生物攻击时会额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，额外伤害等同于攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Die Angriffe dieser Kreatur verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} in Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} ihrer Angriffe.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: Die Angriffe dieser Kreatur verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} in Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} ihrer Angriffe.

languages.text: Les créatures affectées infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} égaux aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de leurs attaques.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

traits.locale_text: Les créatures affectées infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} égaux aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de leurs attaques.

languages.text: При нанесении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} атакой это существо наносит еще столько же {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of their attacks.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın saldırıları, bu saldırıların verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir.
